title: top pesto and burrata mozzarella
description: Impress your guests with this side dish combo of sweet roasted carrots and creamy mozzarella, served with homemade pesto.
ingredients: 20 small carrots, scrubbed well but not peeled, carrot tops reserved
40g/1½oz delicate carrot tops, stems removed (from above)
225g/8oz Burrata mozzarella, at room temperature, drained, sliced
100g/3½oz delicate carrot tops (from above), stems removed, roughly chopped
